replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting regally atop a pile of cushions, with the blue sky shining through a sheer curtain behind him.
replies.text: What do you think of my throne?

replies.alt: Blurry photo of Gizmo the cat being held aloft by Mark as he hunts for a moth. Only Gizmo's face is in focus.
replies.text: Did you see where that moth went?

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat looking up at the camera from atop a small cat tower.
replies.text: Hi! üò∫

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his knitted mat, with a sunlit window behind him.
replies.text: Hope you're having a nice, relaxing day ‚òÄ

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on his heated blanket, looking as though he's posing for a portrait.
replies.text: How much longer do I have to hold still?

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on a bookshelf in partial sunlight, looking inquisitively up at the camera.
replies.text: Oh, there you are. Hello!

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat as a kitten, sitting at the base of a cat tower.
replies.text: Oh no, baby photos üòπ

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep on a blanket stretched over Mark's knees.
replies.text: I'm safe, I'm warm, I'm happy. I hope you are too üíñ

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blanket stretched over Mark's knees, with his belly turned up, cheekily looking at the camera.
replies.text: ...belly rubs?

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep with his paw stretched out and placed on Mark's hand.
replies.text: I hope you're doing okay ‚ù§

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in front of a fireplace, looking at the camera with large eyes.
replies.text: Ahhh so warm üî•üíõüî•

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat lying asleep over Mark's knee in front of the fireplace, with both his front paws stretched way out in front of him.
replies.text: I'm so warm... I think I'm melting...

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up behind a curtain in the sunlight, looking at the camera.
replies.text: Love that afternoon sunlight ‚òÄ

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up next to Mark's hip in bed, looking at the camera.
replies.text: So cozy ‚ù§

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep on a blanket with his paw covering his face.
replies.text: I'm having a snooze üí§

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in sunlight shining through a set of blinds, projecting lines of shadow onto him.
replies.text: Do you like my stripes? üêÖ

replies.alt: Close up shot of Gizmo the cat's face as he watches the lawn.
replies.text: Yes, those are rainbows in my fur üåà

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping on the carpet in the sunlight next to a red plastic rod that is part of one of his toys.
replies.text: Afternoon snooze ‚òÄüí§

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's desk, looking back at the camera with curtains behind him.
replies.text: This is one of my favourite spots!

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up in the sunlight against Mark's outstretched feet, with his ears brightly backlit by the sun.
replies.text: My ears are burning, was someone talking about me?

replies.alt: Close up shot of Gizmo the cat as he looks out of a window.
replies.text: I have a great view from this window

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's shoulder, sniffing at a wall.
replies.text: Mark helps me explore the house sometimes

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's desk next to his laptop, beneath a lamp, looking back over his shoulder dramatically.
replies.text: Does this look dramatic enough?

replies.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he looks out a window.
replies.text: This couch gets so much sun in the afternoon üíõ‚òÄ

replies.alt: Close up of half Gizmo the cat's face in the sunlight.
replies.text: Did you know I used to have golden eyes instead of green ones? It's true!

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his back on a bed, cheekily showing his belly.
replies.text: Can I please get some belly rubs?

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in a paper bag in the sunlight, looking directly up at the camera.
replies.text: This is a pretty good bag!

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat asleep on his blue knitted mat.
replies.text: Mark knitted this mat for me, it's very comfy üíô

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting behind a curtain, enjoying the afternoon sunlight and looking up past the camera.
replies.text: Oh, hello! You found my afternoon hiding spot

replies.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he lies on his blue knitted mat.
replies.text: I'm so comfy right now, I never want to move

replies.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he lies in his hammock on top of his cat tower.
replies.text: Hello! üíñ

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat hiding in a red and blue plastic shopping bag, looking out with very large eyes.
replies.text: Shhh, don't tell Mark. I'm waiting to ambush him when he walks past

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat and Mark asleep together on the couch in the afternoon sun.
replies.text: Afternoon naps in the sun with my best friend are my favourite thing üíñüíñ

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting politely on his knitted mat on Mark's desk, looking at the camera.
replies.text: Hi! I hope you're having a good day today

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat crouching in a paper bag.
replies.text: I like this new bag, much better than the old plastic ones were

replies.alt: Extreme close up of Gizmo the cat's face, with very large eyes.
replies.text: FEED ME!

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in his tunnel, with very large eyes.
replies.text: It's tunnel time üò∫

replies.alt: Gizmo walking into a blue fabric bag, which is being held open for him.
replies.text: I miss my old bag. It was great

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping in the sunlight next to a laundry basket, breathing slowly.
replies.text: This is a very good nap ‚òÄüí§üíñ

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping on his knitted mat and breathing slowly.
replies.text: It's good to just stop for a while, occasionally. Please take a break if you need one ‚ù§

replies.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he happily kneads a red dressing gown.
replies.text: I'm safe üåà I'm warm ‚òÄ I'm happy üòª

replies.alt: Gizmo the cat's eyes going from normal sized to very big.
replies.text: Ambush time!
